On Wed, 30 Apr 2003 03:43:33 +1200, J. B. Rainsberger wrote:

> So am I correct to paraphrase you this way? "There aren't the proper Ant
> tasks to support building native applications written in C/C++".
> 
> If so, then Ant's not the problem. I'm just trying to understand, so don't
> feel like I'm contradicting you for the sake of it.

One could use Want - which is written in Delphi, and has built in tasks
for compiling delphi applications, and others, I can't remember the URL
off hand thou.
